step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead! Keep that arm straight and feel the stretch.
You're opening your palm and fingers wide. This is perfect for preparing to make a fist.
Excellent! You're making a tight fist while inhaling and squeezing your muscles. Keep up the good work.
Fantastic! You're opening your hand and relaxing your muscles as you exhale. Visualize that fluid moving.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and really focus on opening your hand wide and making a tight fist with each breath. This helps move fluid effectively.
